message.name: ERR_LA_PETITION_XFV_FILED_DATE_GREATER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: Filed Date must be on or before today.

message.name: ERR_LA_PETITION_XFV_CREATION_DATE_GREATER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: Creation Date must be on or before today.

message.name: ERR_LA_PETITION_FV_ROLES_BOTH_SELECTED
message.locale: The %1s cannot be both the agency and a participant

message.name: ERR_LA_PETITION_FV_PERSONS_BOTH_SELECTED
message.locale: Same person can not be %1s as well as %2s.

message.name: ERR_LA_PETITION_FV_EMPTY_SELECTION
message.locale: Either agency or participant must be selected for %1s.

message.name: ERR_LA_PETITION_FV_ORG_MULTIPLE_SELECTION
message.locale: Agency can not be selected for multiple roles.It can be either %1s/%2s/%3s.

message.name: ERR_LA_PETITION_FV_OUTCOME_HEARING_CREATED
message.locale: Only legal hearing can be created when petition outcome is %1c.

message.name: ERR_LA_PETITION_FV_OUTCOME_GRANTED
message.locale: Either legal order or legal hearing can be created when petition outcome is %1c.

message.name: ERR_LA_XFV_PETITION_FILLED_DATE_MAYNOT_BEFORE_DOB_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: Filed Date must not be before the date of birth of any participant in the Legal Action.

message.name: ERR_LA_XFV_PETITION_CREATION_DATE_MAYNOT_BEFORE_DOB_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: Creation Date must not be before the date of birth of any participant in the Legal Action.
